name: mri_seghead
author: FreeSurfer Developers
description: Binarizes an input volume to identify the head's voxels.

inputs.description: Fill value for binarizing the head (default 255).
inputs.name: Fill Value

inputs.description: FHI value used in type change operation (default 0.999).
inputs.name: FHI Value

inputs.description: Threshold value for detecting the skin (e.g., 20).
inputs.name: Threshold 1

inputs.description: Threshold value for the final binarization (e.g., 20).
inputs.name: Threshold 2

inputs.description: Single threshold value applied to both thresh1 and thresh2.
inputs.name: Combined Threshold

inputs.description: Minimum number of consecutive hits needed to identify skin (default 2).
inputs.name: Minimum Hits

inputs.description: File to write the volume of the head in mm3 to an ASCII file.
inputs.name: Head Volume Output File

inputs.description: Consider signals behind the head in the binarization process.
inputs.name: Signal Behind Head Flag

inputs.description: Rescale the input when converting to uchar.
inputs.name: Rescale Input Flag

inputs.description: Fill holes and remove islands in the binary volume.
inputs.name: Fill Holes and Remove Islands Flag

inputs.description: Seed point specified by column, row, slice for filling operation.
inputs.name: Seed Point

inputs.description: Mask file to include voxels in the binarization process.
inputs.name: OR Mask File

inputs.description: Optional diagnostic option for internal use.
inputs.name: Gdiag Option
